items.sentence: I\'m tired, but I still have a lot of work I need to do.
Tom may not be the only one here who understands French.
Tom doesn\'t know what\'s going on, but he\'ll find out.
Tom didn\'t care how it got done as long as it got done.
Tom didn\'t even have the decency to admit he was wrong.
Tom is one of the most irritating people I\'ve ever met.
Tom is so gullible he\'ll believe anything you tell him.
Tom posed for a picture in front of his office building.
Tom poured some milk into a glass and handed it to Mary.
Tom and Mary are getting ready to go on their honeymoon.
